reasons.title: Inconsistent style
reasons.description: All icons in a set need to be in the same style. Icons in a single set should be all glyph, all line, all flat, etc. Please update this set to be in a consistent design style or split it into different sets grouped by style. Read more about consistency: http://support.iconfinder.com/en/articles/2548775-consistency

reasons.title: Inconsistent sizes
reasons.description: All icons in a set need to have the same size and have the same visual volume. Please use the same size artboard for all icons and also fit all icons to the artboard. More information about artboards: http://support.iconfinder.com/en/articles/18154-artboards-and-icon-templates. Read more about consistency: http://support.iconfinder.com/en/articles/2548775-consistency

reasons.title: Inconsistent line weight
reasons.description: All icons in a set need to have matching line weights. Having an icon with thin strokes and other icons with thick strokes makes the set become inconsistent. Please also check that the artboards are the same size for all icons. Read more about consistency: http://support.iconfinder.com/en/articles/2548775-consistency

reasons.title: Inconsistent colors
reasons.description: All icons in a set should use the same color palette. Also, using a narrow palette is better for a consistent set. If you choose to use a lot of colors, then try to balance them around the set to keep the icons still matching well together. Read more about consistency: http://support.iconfinder.com/en/articles/2548775-consistency

reasons.title: Inconsistent effects
reasons.description: All icons in a set should use the same effects. For example, if you add a shadow to one icon and a gradient to another, then the set becomes inconsistent. Read more about consistency: http://support.iconfinder.com/en/articles/2548775-consistency

reasons.title: Inconsistent shapes
reasons.description: The shapes that compose the icons should be the same across the set. If, for example, all icons are composed of a circle and a square, but one of them is using a triangle instead, that makes the set become inconsistent. Or, if you use arrows, make sure these look the same everywhere in the set. Read more about consistency: http://support.iconfinder.com/en/articles/2548775-consistency

reasons.title: Inconsistent background shapes
reasons.description: The background shapes should be the same across the set. Read more about consistency: http://support.iconfinder.com/en/articles/2548775-consistency

reasons.title: Text inconsistent with icon style
reasons.description: When using text, type or characters on icons, make them be consistent with the style of the icon. The text elements should not stand out as different from the icons. Read more about consistency: http://support.iconfinder.com/en/articles/2548775-consistency

reasons.title: Too little variety within set
reasons.description: This set contains icons that are too repetitive. Sets that only contain one kind of icon with small differences do not sell well. Customers prefer to buy sets that have different icons that can be used together in the same project. Check our article on variety: http://support.iconfinder.com/en/articles/2548767-variety

reasons.title: Too many variations
reasons.description: This set is too similar to another version you have also submitted. Adding minimal changes such as backgrounds, shapes, or gradients creates too much repetition and is unnecessary, and clogs up the search results with similar icons. Try to create fewer, versatile, higher quality sets, rather than multiple versions of the same idea. Read more about variations here: http://support.iconfinder.com/en/articles/2611383-variations

reasons.title: Unnecessary colors
reasons.description: Adding colors to these icons does not add any value. If the colors do not have any clear purpose, it is better not to use them. The same applies to unnecesary gradients. Read about colors: http://support.iconfinder.com/en/articles/2620425-colors. Learn about business relevance: http://support.iconfinder.com/en/articles/2533515-business-relevance and about variations: http://support.iconfinder.com/en/articles/2611383-variations

reasons.title: Unnecessary background shapes
reasons.description: The background shapes do not add value to these icons. In that case, it is better not to use them. Each component of an icon should have a purpose. If there is no clear purpose for the background shapes, it is better not to use them - sometimes they can reduce the usability of the icons and hurt sales. Read about business relevance: http://support.iconfinder.com/en/articles/2533515-business-relevance and about variations: http://support.iconfinder.com/en/articles/2611383-variations

reasons.title: Lack of uniqueness
reasons.description: These icons will have a hard time selling on Iconfinder as there is little that is unique about them, and many similar sets in this style and/or topic already exist. Make sure your icons stand out from the rest, and bring something new to customers. Try to search these icon’s tags on Iconfinder to see what existing content we already sell, and re-submit a set that’s fresh and different from what customers can already purchase.

reasons.title: Low business value
reasons.description: These icons will have a hard time selling as there is little need for these concepts and design choices. Please make sure all icons are considered relevant and useful, and can fulfill the various needs of users.

reasons.title: Oversupply of icons in this style
reasons.description: The market for icons in this style is saturated and very competitive. That is why we can only accept icons of high quality, that can stand out and catch customers’ attention. Your icons need more work to become distinguished among all the other icons in this style. Read about business relevance: http://support.iconfinder.com/en/articles/2533515-business-relevance and about uniqueness: http://support.iconfinder.com/en/articles/2546060-uniqueness

reasons.title: Oversupply of icons on this topic
reasons.description: The market for icons on this topic is saturated and very competitive. That is why we can only accept icons of high quality, that can stand out and catch customers’ attention. Your icons need more work to become distinguished among all the other icons on this topic. Try focusing on some novel topics. Read about business relevance: http://support.iconfinder.com/en/articles/2533515-business-relevance and about uniqueness: http://support.iconfinder.com/en/articles/2546060-uniqueness

reasons.title: Icons not aesthetic
reasons.description: The majority of icons in this set need improvement and will not compete well with our existing content. At the moment, the icons do not look well drawn or feel harmonious, and their usability is unclear. Remember to limit the use of unnecessary elements, colors, and gradients. Try to identify the likely scenario for buying this set (using on a restaurant menu, website toolbar, school presentation) and work towards that goal, while paying more attention to the details. Read more about aesthetic appeal: http://support.iconfinder.com/en/articles/2548769-aesthetic-appeal

reasons.title: Shapes not aesthetic
reasons.description: The shapes in many of these icons do not meet our standards. They need some extra work to be able to compete with our existing content and sell well. Icons including hands, gestures, faces, expressions, and movement must be extremely accurate and precise to be approved. Make sure the dimensions, sizes, and line width work well for your topic. Carefully choose which details avoid, and which to include. Create icons that look beautiful individually, but also work well consistently when viewed all together.  Learn about aesthetic appeal: http://support.iconfinder.com/en/articles/2548769-aesthetic-appeal

reasons.title: Colors not aesthetic
reasons.description: The choice of colors needs more work in this set. A good choice of colors will make the icons more appealing and they will sell better. Also, if you are using too strong colors, they can hurt sales. Check our article on colors: http://support.iconfinder.com/en/articles/2620425-colors. Learn more about aesthetic appeal: http://support.iconfinder.com/en/articles/2548769-aesthetic-appeal

reasons.title: Lack of refinement or style
reasons.description: These icons need more work to have the right quality for Iconfinder and compete with our existing content. Spend some additional time refining details by making sure lines and elements are not clashing, shapes are nicely spaced, the set feels consistent, and everything looks well constructed. Most importantly, try to develop and showcase your personal style to help stand out more, as we already have similar looking sets for sale. Read up on our quality standards before re-submitting: http://support.iconfinder.com/en/articles/2549020-quality-standards

reasons.title: Style conversions
reasons.description: Directly transforming icons from one style to another is not a good practice and usually ends up with icons that don’t look right. Each set of icons needs needs to be rethought for each individual style and designed accordingly. Read more about style conversions: http://support.iconfinder.com/en/articles/4062490-directly-converted-glyphs

reasons.title: Icons not thorough
reasons.description: This set feels rushed and has too many repetitive or basic elements, lacking the attention to details that we require. Please spend more time to make sure that each individual icon is constructed carefully and thoroughly.

reasons.title: Text on icons
reasons.description: In general, try to avoid using text on icons. Text can limit their usability. If you really need to use text, then make sure it matches the style of the icons. Read more about quality: http://support.iconfinder.com/en/articles/2549020-quality-standards

reasons.title: Upload in SVG format
reasons.description: Please upload the icons in SVG format. We accept PNGs only as an exception for icons that cannot be exported as vector (for example, for highly-rendered 3D icons). Check our technical requirements for icons: http://support.iconfinder.com/en/articles/2541051-technical-requirements

reasons.title: No silhouettes
reasons.description: We do not accept artwork that is simply a literal silhouette of an object without creative interpretation. Check our technical requirements for icons: http://support.iconfinder.com/en/articles/2541051-technical-requirements

reasons.title: No letterforms, numbers, or fonts
reasons.description: We do not accept artwork that is simply a collection of letters, numbers, or keyboard characters. Check our technical requirements for icons: http://support.iconfinder.com/en/articles/2541051-technical-requirements

reasons.title: Too few icons in set
reasons.description: The minimum number of icons per set is 10. Please add more icons. The ideal icon set size is between 30 and 50 icons. This is large enough to offer the customer ample icons around a single topic, but small enough to not devalue icons. Check our technical requirements for icons: http://support.iconfinder.com/en/articles/2541051-technical-requirements

reasons.title: Too many icons in set
reasons.description: The maximum number of icons per set is 250. We recommend to split the icons into two or more sets. The ideal icon set size is between 30 and 50 icons. This is large enough to offer the customer ample icons around a single topic, but small enough to not devalue icons. Remember you can group sets in families. Check our technical requirements for icons: http://support.iconfinder.com/en/articles/2541051-technical-requirements

reasons.title: Incorrect tags
reasons.description: Please keep all your tags specific and relevant to what the icon depicts. Consider each tag individually, and ask yourself it it would make sense for your icon to appear if that word is searched. Read our tagging guidelines for details: https://support.iconfinder.com/en/articles/18163-tags

reasons.title: Too many tags
reasons.description: The ideal number of tags is between 4 and 7 per icon. If you have more than 7 tags, that will decrease the rank of the icon in the search results. Learn about tags here: http://support.iconfinder.com/en/articles/18163-tags

reasons.title: Too few tags
reasons.description: The ideal number of tags is between 4 and 7 per icon. If it makes sense to have less than 4 tags, that is ok. If you have more than 7 tags, that will decrease the rank of the icon in the search results. Learn about tags here: http://support.iconfinder.com/en/articles/18163-tags

reasons.title: No logos or other trademarked elements
reasons.description: For legal reasons, we cannot sell icons that include company logos or trademarks such as those belonging to social media sites (Facebook, YouTube, Twitter) or banking and payment logos (Visa, MasterCard, PayPal). We can only accept them as free icons. Check our technical requirements for icons: https://support.iconfinder.com/en/articles/4147363-logos-trademarks

reasons.title: Not iconic, too many details
reasons.description: Icons are simplified, idealized, stylized images that represent an action, object, or idea. They should be easily recognisable in small sizes. An icon that has too many details makes the icon hard to use and not iconic. Check our technical requirements for icons: http://support.iconfinder.com/en/articles/2541051-technical-requirements

reasons.title: Alignment within artboard
reasons.description: Icons should be centered and fit within the artboard. The artboard must be squared and have the same size for all icons. Having small icons on a large artboard leads to small icon previews. Having different artboard sizes leads to inconsistent line weights in the previews. If icons are larger than the artboard, they will get clipped edges. Read about artboards here: http://support.iconfinder.com/en/articles/18154-artboards-and-icon-templates

reasons.title: White fill error
reasons.description: Some shapes have white fills where they should probably be transparent. Try viewing your icons on a dark background to make sure they look as you intend.

reasons.title: Split your icon set into individual files
reasons.description: You have submitted a single vector file with all your icons. Please split it to have each icon as a separate SVG file. Check our technical requirements: http://support.iconfinder.com/en/articles/2541051-technical-requirements

reasons.title: Icon set name should be relevant to set content
reasons.description: Icon set names should describe what the set is about. Try to use unique and memorable set names. Check our technical requirements for set names: http://support.iconfinder.com/en/articles/2541051-technical-requirements

reasons.title: Too similar to another designer
reasons.description: While nobody can copyright or own a design style, in some cases, too much similarity between designers or icon sets creates confusion for customers. Read our Policy for copyright infringing material: http://support.iconfinder.com/en/articles/18197-policy-towards-copyright-infringing-material and learn about uniqueness: http://support.iconfinder.com/en/articles/2546060-uniqueness

reasons.title: Lack of diversity
reasons.description: Try to not limit your icons to stereotypes. Include different kinds of people in your set. Do not stick only to white businessmen or women doing housework. Try to stay open-minded and add some diversity of gender, skin color, age, etc. Read about diversity in icon design: https://blog.iconfinder.com/the-issue-of-diversity-in-icon-design-e48100e11943

reasons.title: Missing address information
reasons.description: We are missing your address information and cannot approve your set without it. This information will be visible only to you and it will be used on your receipts for icon sales. You can add it here: https://www.iconfinder.com/account/payment-settings

reasons.title: Please do not ignore suggestions
reasons.description: Please do not ignore our requests for changes to your icons. Ignoring our recommendations wastes your time and ours and resubmitting the icons without changes will not achieve a different result. It risks getting the set rejected.

reasons.title: We accept only icons
reasons.description: Please do not upload generic graphics. We can only accept icons. Icons are simplified, idealised, stylised images that represent an action, object, or idea. They should be easily recognisable in small sizes.
